Text:
The Video TS folder will not burn there`s a problem with the IFO`s and NAV Pack if you try to burn it as "DVD Video File" you`ll receive a DVD-Video files reallocation error! relating to the IFO`S

Rebuild the movie using DVD Rebuilder pro (or similar) after which the resulting "Video TS" folder should be fine and burn minus the reallocation error.

kremenisch you need to burn the Video TS Folder onto a blank DVD disc not a cd.As there`s not enough space available to fit all the data onto a cd.
The size of the file should have made that fairly obvious, this isn`t a DVD Rip it`s a retail DVD
